programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Forever Young - The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03
programme.desc: Super Guppies! - When Molly and Gil bring a comic book to school, all the Guppies want to be superheroes! Molly and Gil dive into the adventure as Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy, but can our heroes stop the smelly villain Sid Fishious?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! // The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Forever Young - The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01
programme.desc: Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03
programme.desc: Tracker Joins the Pups! - Ryder and the pups are on their way to the jungle to help Carlos move a massive relic to the museum when he falls into a deep pit. Carlos is saved by a big eared pup named Tracker. For his bravery Tracker is made an honorary member of the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03
programme.desc: The Pups Winter Wonder Show - The Adventure Bay Snow-Show is in trouble when Mayor Humdinger escapes with the feature act: Cap’n Turbot’s performing penguins. It’s up to the Paw Patrol, with the help of Tracker, to save the day so that the show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? programme.title: The Numtums (S2)
programme.desc: Has Anyone Seen Hobart? - It's the day of the big trip to the Big Sandy Desert and everyone is very excited except Hobart who wants to spend some time on his own.

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Pirates - It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower, France - Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Giza, Egypt - Glitch creates trouble with a little pyramid when he and the Go Jetters visit the Pyramids of Giza in Egypt.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1)
programme.desc: Mirrors - Kit and Pup have found a floor-length mirror, and Kit soon discovers she can use her reflection to play tricks on Pup.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1)
programme.desc: Bus - Dee encourages a friend to say bus and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1)
programme.desc: Three - Laa‐Laa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Clangers (S3)
programme.desc: Toots - When Tiny is out fishing in the music boat, she catches four strange metal objects. She takes them home to show Small, but when Small arrives and looks in the music boat with Tiny, the things have gone!

programme.desc: The Thing That Knew Everything - Gwen meets a group of Dinos who are waiting for The One Who Knows Everything.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1)
programme.desc: Puppy Snuggle Time - A puppy sleepover in Doug-Po's room proves problematic when the puppies keep falling out of bed.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: Piggy Blues - Monty discovers Jimmy Jones is sad and tries to cheer him up, but wonders why everyone can't be happy all the time.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: Follow the Leader - The Kazoops struggle to work as a team when building their new table tennis table.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2)
programme.desc: Never Ever Never Step On The Cracks - Lola is in a superstitious mood, and there are so many unlucky things you can do. Charlie plays along, but Lola's imagination soon gets carried away.

programme.desc: Look After Your Planet - The duo are on a recycling mission. Soon they involve the whole school, determined to enter a competition that could win them all a tree to plant.

programme.desc: Moon Path - On a cloudless night, Nelly and Nora help Mrs. Bonner search for her cat Morris.

programme.desc: The Train Runs Cold - Nelly and Nora try to figure out who made the tracks in the snow.

programme.desc: Jumping Jobi Wood - Thomas is ordered to collect some precious Jobi wood from Misty Island. Chaos ensues when naughty crane Old Wheezy starts throwing the logs everywhere.

programme.desc: The Beach - As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.desc: Ep. 229 - Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.desc: Ep. 606 - A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06
programme.desc: Ep. 108 - The Patty Caper / Plankton's Regular - It's time to restock the secret Krabby Patty ingredient, and it is SpongeBob's duty to make sure the ingredient is delivered safely to the Krusty Krab. // Plankton has a customer who eats at the Chum Bucket every day.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Ep. 35 - Sr. 33 - Costa works with landscapers of all abilities; Josh visits a daylily grower; Millie grows a water garden; Hannah wards off pesky weeds; Sophie learns about dune ecology; we meet a farming family celebrating perennial plants.

programme.title: Escape From The City
programme.desc: Ep. 30 - Sr. 1 - Finding the right house at the right price near Lake Macquarie may require a lengthy search for Sydney couple Fran and Ron. In addition to being their home, they also want it to double as a location for a therapy centre.

programme.desc: Ep. 46 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News

programme.desc: Ep. 4 - Sr. 1 - Conquering her fear of bees, Analiese gets her first beehive, before heading off on an adventure of foraging, fishing and diving with best friend and famous Thai restaurateur, Palisa Anderson in pristine Satellite Island.

programme.title: Running Wild: Australia's Camels
programme.desc: Robyn Davidson, famous for her solo expedition across the west Australian deserts by camel in the 1970s, presents this documentary telling the story of Australia's camels and the people who brought them here.

programme.title: Inside Central Station
programme.desc: Ep. 9 - Sr. 1 - A serious incident shuts down a major line causing chaos on the network and at Central Station Garry has his hands full with a Hollywood film shoot.

programme.title: Outback Vet

programme.title: Back To Nature
programme.desc: Ep. 1 - Sr. 1 - In this visually stunning series, Aaron Pedersen and Holly Ringland guide us through our land's unique stories. They visit Springbrook National Park on Yugambeh Country in Qld, inviting us to deepen our connection to nature.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Ep. 11 - Sr. 6 - Marcia Hines is an Australian music icon. She arrived in Australia, from Boston, as a 16-year-old to perform in the musical Hair and then made Australia her home. How will Anh capture her independence and bravery?
